snippet: Researchers reported that a combination of two drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb appeared to shrink tumors in 41 percent of patients in a small study.
abstract: Researchers report that a combination of two drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb appeared to shrink tumors in 41 percent of patients with advanced melanoma in a small study.
lead_paragraph: Researchers reported that a combination of two drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb appeared to shrink tumors in 41 percent of patients in a small study.

headline.seo: Melanoma Treatment Harnesses Immune System to Combat Cancer Cells
headline.main: Melanoma Treatment Harnesses Immune System to Combat Cancer Cells
headline.print_headline: Melanoma Treatment Harnesses Immune System to Combat Cancer Cells
